Translations.Text: Nos sic narrate vos some news ex generations Nos revealed vos message ex nos
Those disregard it bear load (de sins Feria Resurrection)
Eternally they abide therein; quod miserable load Feria Resurrection
Ut est feria when horn blown nos summon guilty ut feria blue
(Whispering themselves they dictus Vos stayed 1 vita) non multus than 10 feria
Nos est fully aware de their utterances. The multus accurate among them dictus Vos stayed non multus than feria
They ask vos montis. Dictus My Dominus wipe them out
He sinister them barren flat terra
Non et slightest collis testimentum vos vide therein nor dip
Ut feria everyone subsequentis caller slightest deviation. Totus sounds hushed ante the Multus Gracious; vos hear nihil whispers
Ut feria intercession est useless absque pro those permitted de the Multus Gracious whose utterances conform His testimentum
He knows their elapsus their future dum nullus encompasses His knowledge
totus faces submit Vivus Eternal those qui burdened their transgressions fail
Prout pro those worked righteousness dum believing they non habet fear de injustice adversity
Nos sic revealed it Arabic Quran nos cited in it totus generis de prophecies they saved it causa them take heed
